data.name: World Titans War
data.detailed_description:
WORLD TITANS WAR


Tomorrow’s world is infernally boring, society has evolved and a large part of the population can’t satisfy their primary needs, for this reason, Titan Link Corp. offers unique experiences, where people, thanks to the technology, are able to return to the past and Survive in a world set in Europe during Second World War.

World Titans War will immerse you in a hostile world, where only your reputation can make your life easier, get ready to survive in a world where no one trusts anyone, try it alone or with your friends.


As a civilian you will have to get provisions, build your new home, improve your skills, trade, carry out missions and most importantly, survive.


As a soldier you must collaborate with your army, communicate, attack and defend the territory, take advantage of the experience and rewards obtained fighting in the army to make your life in the world of World Titans War more comfortable.

Survive to the Second World War using the right tactics and strategies. Collaborate with your army to win the war by advancing across the terrain step by step.

Manage resources correctly and crush your enemies!

data.short_description: Tactical survival inspired by WWII. The action is guaranteed from the first moment. You will start out as a civilian forced to seek resources to survive, you will be able to join an army and fight, with or without allies. In time of war there will be no mercy.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 / AMD Radeon Pro WX 5100
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 98 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 98 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD
